name: NFSdb
body:
NFSdb
======

Monster performance. Brutal simplicity. Sub-microsecond latency with no GC overhead. Unlimited capacity. Open Source. Tiny total cost of ownership.

Yes, it is another database and no, it is not like any other. Too good to be true? Download now and try yourself.

NFSdb opens new horizons for software development: no longer you have to worry about how to store your data, just focus on the thinking what you can do with it.

Jump to our [wiki page] (https://github.com/bluestreak01/nfsdb/wiki) to get started!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
